name: Six Hours at Lemmy's
description:
It's the year 1989. After the fall of Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, the animatronics were sold to an obscure company known as Lemmy Incorporated. The side gang, Bonnie, Chica, and Foxy, were cast into disarray while Freddy was redesigned into Lemmy. Lemmy's diner opened and you eagerly signed up for the job, not knowing the dangers awaiting you...

Doors: You have two doors which you can close using A and D. After they are closed, they will stay that way and open after ten seconds.

Monitor: The monitor has two cameras which you can view Lemmy on. If Lemmy appears on the left camera, close the right door and vise versa.

Repair Tablet: Use this to repair failing systems such as the cameras and oxygen supply.

Six Hours at Lemmy's is my starting project for complex coding and visual improvement. Think of it as my Mona Lisa.
